instruction: Analyze the poem below and tell me what it is about.
input:
Summer fades away
The wind so wild and free
The sound of nature is all around 
The beauty ever seen
output: The poem is about the change of seasons from summer to autumn. The wind, a representation of nature, is described as being wild and free, suggesting the freedom of the change of season. The beauty of nature is alluded to in the last line, suggesting the beauty of the changing of the seasons.
